ESRI_ItemInformation.name: World Continents
ESRI_ItemInformation.snippet: This layer represents the boundaries for the continents of the world.
ESRI_ItemInformation.description: This layer represents the boundaries for the continents of the world. The layer is suitable for display to a largest scale of 1:15,000,000.
ESRI_ItemInformation.summary: This layer represents the boundaries for the continents of the world.
ESRI_ItemInformation.title: World Continents
ESRI_ItemInformation.tags: layer, polygon, continents, Africa, Asia, Australia, Europe, North America, Oceania, South America, Antarctica, coastlines, boundaries, World, 1996, 1998, 2000, 2007
